inclusion.criterion: Soldiers actively enlisted in the US Army attached to basic training unit at Fort Jackson
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of any form of cancer
exclusion.label: triggers
triggers
exclusion.evidence: quote: The patient's sister had the same problems.  She was diagnosed with Paget's disease of bone when she was 52 years old.

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy.
